issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.summary: JsonGenerator in Configuration#dumpConfiguration() is not closed

comments.body:
I modify "flush()" at the end to "close()".
close function will force flushing of output and close underlying output stream.
[~ozawa] Thanks for your review! I added try-finally block and modified code using IOUtils.cleanup() method.
